string-array.name: stegen
string-array.item: Marc-André ter Stegen is a German professional footballer who plays as a goalkeeper for Spanish club Barcelona and the Germany national team. He is considered as one of the best goalkeepers in the world.
Current teams: FC Barcelona (#1 / Goalkeeper), Germany national football team (#22 / Goalkeeper)

string-array.name: dest
string-array.item: Sergiño Gianni Dest is an American professional soccer player who plays as a right-back for FC Barcelona and the United States national team. Born in the Netherlands to a Dutch mother and American father, Dest has represented the United States internationally at senior level since 2019.
Current teams: FC Barcelona (#2 / Defender), United States men national soccer team (Defender)
Dates joined: 2020 (FC Barcelona), 2019 (United States men national soccer team, AFC Ajax)

string-array.name: pique
string-array.item: Gerard Piqué Bernabeu is a Spanish professional footballer who plays as a centre-back for Barcelona.
Current teams: FC Barcelona (#3 / Defender), Catalonia national football team (Defender)

string-array.name: araujo
string-array.item: Ronald Federico Araújo da Silva is a Uruguayan professional footballer who plays as a centre-back for Spanish club Barcelona and the Uruguay national team.
Current teams: FC Barcelona (#4 / Defender), Uruguay national football team (Defender)

string-array.name: busquets
string-array.item: Sergio Busquets Burgos is a Spanish professional footballer who plays as a defensive midfielder for Barcelona and the Spain national team. Busquets is widely regarded as one of the best defensive midfielders of all time due to his composure on the ball, vision, defensive awareness, passing ability, and dribbling.

string-array.name: alena
string-array.item: Carles Aleñá Castillo is a Spanish professional footballer who plays as a central midfielder for Barcelona.
Current teams: FC Barcelona (#6 / Midfielder), Spain national under-21 football team (Midfielder)
Dates joined: December 28, 2019 (Real Betis), February 2016 (FC Barcelona), 2015 (FC Barcelona B)

string-array.name: griezmann
string-array.item: Antoine Griezmann is a French professional footballer who plays as a forward for Spanish club Barcelona and the France national team. Wikipedia
Current teams: FC Barcelona (#7 / Forward), France national football team (Forward)
Awards: UEFA Euro adidas Golden Boot

string-array.name: pjanic
string-array.item: Miralem Pjanić is a Bosnian-Herzegovinian professional footballer who plays as a midfielder for Spanish club Barcelona and the Bosnia and Herzegovina national team. Pjanić started his professional career at Metz being there for one season. Wikipedia
Born: April 2, 1990 (age 30 years), Tuzla, Bosnia and Herzegovina
Current teams: FC Barcelona (#8 / Midfielder), Bosnia and Herzegovina national football team (Midfielder)

string-array.name: braithwaite
string-array.item: Martin Christensen Braithwaite is a Danish professional footballer who plays for Spanish club Barcelona and the Denmark national team. Mainly a forward, he can also play in the winger position. Wikipedia
Current teams: FC Barcelona (#9 / Forward), Denmark national football team (Forward)

string-array.name: messi
string-array.item: Lionel Andrés Messi is an Argentine professional footballer who plays as a forward and captains both Spanish club Barcelona and the Argentina national team.
Awards: European Golden Shoe, FIFA World Player of the Year,

string-array.name: dembele
string-array.item: Masour Ousmane Dembélé is a French professional footballer who plays as a forward for Spanish club Barcelona and the France national football team. Born in Vernon, Dembélé began his career at Rennes before joining Dortmund in 2016.

string-array.name: puig
string-array.item: Ricard "Riqui" Puig Martí is a Spanish professional footballer who plays for Barcelona as a central midfielder. Wikipedia
Current teams: FC Barcelona (#12 / Midfielder), Spain national under-21 football team (Midfielder)

string-array.name: neto
string-array.item: Norberto Murara Neto, commonly known as Neto, is a Brazilian professional footballer who plays as a goalkeeper for Spanish club Barcelona. Neto began his career with Brazilian side Athletico Paranaense and later played for Italian side Fiorentina.
Born: July 19, 1989 (age 31 years), Araxá, State of Minas Gerais, Brazil

string-array.name: coutinho
string-array.item: Philippe Coutinho Correia is a Brazilian professional footballer who plays as an attacking midfielder or winger for Spanish club Barcelona and the Brazil national team. He is known for his combination of vision, passing, dribbling and ability to conjure curving long-range strikes.
Born: June 12, 1992 (age 28 years), Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
Current teams: FC Barcelona (#14 / Midfielder), Brazil national football team (Midfielder)

string-array.name: lenglet
string-array.item: Clément Nicolas Laurent Lenglet is a French professional footballer who plays as a centre-back for Spanish club Barcelona and the France national team. He began his career with Nancy, making 85 appearances from his debut in 2013, and winning the Ligue 2 title in the 2015–16 season.
Current teams: FC Barcelona (#15 / Defender), France national football team (Defender)
Dates joined: July 2018 (FC Barcelona), 2017 (Sevilla FC), 2013 (AS Nancy)

string-array.name: pedri
string-array.item: Pedro González López, commonly known as Pedri, is a Spanish professional footballer who plays as an attacking midfielder for Barcelona.
Current teams: FC Barcelona (#16 / Forward), Spain national under-21 football team (Forward)

string-array.name: trincao
string-array.item: Francisco António Machado Mota Castro Trincão
Francisco António Machado Mota Castro Trincão is a Portuguese professional footballer who plays as a winger for Spanish club Barcelona and the Portugal national team.
Born: December 29, 1999 (age 20 years), Viana do Castelo District, Portugal
Dates joined: 2020 (FC Barcelona), 2018 (S.C. Braga), 2016 (S.C. Braga B)

string-array.name: alba
string-array.item: Jordi Alba Ramos is a Spanish professional footballer who plays as a left-back for Barcelona and the Spain national team. He started his career at Barcelona, but was released after being deemed too small. After joining Cornellà, he moved to Valencia
Born: March 21, 1989 (age 31 years), LHospitalet de Llobregat, Spain

string-array.name: matheus
string-array.item: Matheus Fernandes Siqueira, known as Matheus Fernandes, is a Brazilian professional footballer who plays as a central midfielder for Spanish club Barcelona
Born: June 30, 1998 (age 22 years), Itaboraí, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
Dates joined: December 2018 (Sociedade Esportiva Palmeiras), 2016 (Botafogo de Futebol e Regatas)

string-array.name: roberto
string-array.item: Sergi Roberto Carnicer is a Spanish professional footballer who plays for Barcelona and the Spain national team. Mainly a full-back, he can also operate as a defensive midfielder, central midfielder or winger.
Parents: Maria Rosa Carnicer, Josep Maria Roberto

string-array.name: jong
string-array.item: Frenkie de Jong is a Dutch professional footballer who plays as a midfielder for Spanish club Barcelona and the Netherlands national team. A versatile playmaker, he is known for his strong defensive abilities. De Jong began his professional career at Willem II in 2015.
Current teams: FC Barcelona (#21 / Midfielder), Netherlands national football team (Midfielder)

string-array.name: fati
string-array.item: Anssumane "Ansu" Fati Vieira is a Spanish professional footballer who plays as a left winger for Barcelona and the Spain national team. He was born in Guinea-Bissau but represents Spain internationally.
Date joined: 2019 (FC Barcelona, FC Barcelona Juvenil A, ...)

string-array.name: umtiti
string-array.item: Samuel Yves Um Titi, known as Samuel Umtiti, is a French professional footballer who plays as a centre-back for Spanish club Barcelona and the French national team. Umtiti began his professional career with Lyon in 2012, winning both the Coupe de France and Trophée des Champions in his first year.
Current teams: FC Barcelona (#23 / Defender), France national football team (Defender)

string-array.name: junior
string-array.item: Héctor Junior Firpo Adames, known as Junior Firpo or simply Junior, is a Dominican born-Spanish professional footballer who plays for Barcelona. Mainly a left-back, he can also play as a winger or a central defender.
Born: August 22, 1996 (age 24 years), Santo Domingo, Dominican Republic
Current teams: FC Barcelona (#24 / Defender), Spain national under-21 football team (Defender)
